ciss_vae.utils.run_cissvae.run_cissvae

run_cissvae(data, val_percent=0.1, replacement_value=0.0, columns_ignore=None, print_dataset=True, clusters=None, n_clusters=None, cluster_selection_epsilon=0.25, seed=42, hidden_dims=[150, 120, 60], latent_dim=15, layer_order_enc=['unshared', 'unshared', 'unshared'], layer_order_dec=['shared', 'shared', 'shared'], latent_shared=False, output_shared=False, batch_size=4000, return_model=True, epochs=500, initial_lr=0.01, decay_factor=0.999, beta=0.001, device=None, max_loops=100, patience=2, epochs_per_loop=None, initial_lr_refit=None, decay_factor_refit=None, beta_refit=None, verbose=False)[source]
